name: US City Bus Simulator 2023
description:
Become an ultimate bus driver and complete all exciting missions of bus driving adventures.

Pick up passengers from bus stations and drop them off on marked locations on map. Explore different cities and location and perform the tasks as it prompts on map. Challenge your driving skills in this bus game, as it will give perfect driving experience of driving realistic buses in real city. You can drive all buses of public transportation.

Earn points and money to start your own bus simulator games business. Watch out the tricky tracks as the ride may get bumpy. Drive safely through mountains and improve your bus driving skills, try not to annoy passengers as they might leave a bad review for your driving skills. Entertain yourself with breath-taking graphics of bus games drive though tricky tracks, city environment and different bus stations. The design of the bus is simple and elegant, driving buses can be challenging, don’t let other bus company complete the task before you or you’ll lose your points.

Watch for the hurdles available in the path to reach your destination. Follow the path to reach your checkpoints in time, the bus can be damaged as well watch out for hurdle as they may damage your bus and annoy the passengers. For city bus passenger transport adventures, the streets are filled with cars and different models, you are required to complete the task of transporting passengers from one place to another, try not to hit bus in the obstacles. Reach the destination points to earn bonus and become champion of bus transportation company.

Passenger city bus transport Features

-Pack of different models of buses to drive, multiple buses
-Realistic Bus sound effects
-Smooth controls (Tilt, Buttons or steering wheel)
-Amazing different coach bus
-Become a real bus driver
-Explore different locations
-Different Environments
-Choose Weather (Snow, Rain, Thundering)
-Upgradable items for bus.
-Unique buses with different colors.
-Choose Bus of your Country.
-Bonus for each ride to unlock achievements and trophies
